Nmap

Network exploration tool and port scanner.

Host Discovery

- ARP only host discovery: 

# nmap -T4 -PR -sn -n -vv <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

- ICMP only host discovery: 

# nmap -T4 --disable-arp-ping -PE -PP -PM -sn -n -vv <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

- ARP + ICMP host discovery: 

# nmap -T4 -PE -PP -PM -sn -n -vv <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

Port Probing

- TCP (SYN) all port probing: 

# nmap -T4 -Pn -sS [-g <SRC-PORT>] -p 0- -sV -O -R -vv <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]

- UDP all port probing: 

# nmap -T4 -Pn -sU [-g <SRC-PORT>] -p 0- -sV -O -R -vv <TARGET> [-oA <OUTPUT>]
